æ‰‹å†™ Object.create

æ€è·¯ï¼šå°†ä¼ å…¥çš„å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºåŸå‹

function create(obj) {
  function F() {}
  F.prototype = obj
  return new F()
}

æ‰‹å†™instanceofæ–¹æ³•

instanceof è¿ç®—ç¬¦ç”¨äºåˆ¤æ–­æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„ prototype å±æ€§æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç°åœ¨å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹é“¾ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•ä½ç½®ã€‚

å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

é¦–å…ˆè·å–ç±»å‹çš„åŸå‹ ç„¶åè·å¾—å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹ ç„¶åä¸€ç›´å¾ªç¯åˆ¤æ–­å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹æ˜¯å¦ç­‰äºç±»å‹çš„åŸå‹ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å¯¹è±¡åŸå‹ä¸º nullï¼Œå› ä¸ºåŸå‹é“¾æœ€ç»ˆä¸º null å…·ä½“å®ç°ï¼š

function myInstanceof(left, right) {
  let proto = Object.getPrototypeOf(left), // è·å–å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹
      prototype = right.prototype; // è·å–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„ prototype å¯¹è±¡

  // åˆ¤æ–­æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„ prototype å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å¯¹è±¡çš„åŸå‹é“¾ä¸Š
  while (true) {
    if (!proto) return false;
    if (proto === prototype) return true;

    proto = Object.getPrototypeOf(proto);
  }
}

newæ“ä½œç¬¦çš„å®ç°æ­¥éª¤

  1. åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
  2. å°†å¯¹è±¡ä¸æ„é€ å‡½æ•°é€šè¿‡åŸå‹é“¾è¿æ¥èµ·æ¥(ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°†å¯¹è±¡çš„__proto__å±æ€§æŒ‡å‘æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„prototypeå±æ€§)
  3. æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„thisç»‘å®šåˆ°æ–°çš„å¯¹è±¡ä¸Š(ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ·»åŠ å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•)
  4. è¿”å›æ–°çš„å¯¹è±¡(å¦‚æœè¿”å›ç±»å‹ä¸ºåŸå§‹å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™å¿½ç•¥ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œåˆ™æ­£å¸¸å¤„ç†)
// å¦‚æœæ„é€ å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåŸå§‹å€¼ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè¿”å›å€¼æ— ä»»ä½•ä½œç”¨
function Test(name) {
    this.name = name
    return 1
}

const t = new Test('xxx')
console.log(t.name) // 'xxx'

// å¦‚æœæ„é€ å‡½æ•°è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å€¼ä¼šè¢«æ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨
function Test(name) {
    this.name = name
    console.log(this) // Test {name: 'xxx'}
    return {
        age: 26
    }
}
const t = new Test('xxx')
console.log(t) // {age: 26}
console.log(t.name) // 'undefined'

// æ‰‹æ’•newæ“ä½œç¬¦
function myNew(constructor, ...args) {
    // 1.åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç©ºå¯¹è±¡ 
    const obj = {}
    // 2.å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡çš„å†…éƒ¨åŸå‹é“¾æ¥åˆ°æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„prototypeå¯¹è±¡  
    obj.__proto__ = constructor.prototype
    // 3.å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºthisä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œå¹¶è°ƒç”¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°  
    let result = constructor.apply(obj, args)
    // 4.å¦‚æœæ„é€ å‡½æ•°è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼›å¦åˆ™è¿”å›æ–°åˆ›å»ºçš„å¯¹è±¡
    return result instanceOf Object ? result : obj
}

æ‰‹å†™Promise

ä¸‰ç§çŠ¶æ€ï¼š pending(è¿›è¡Œä¸­)ã€fulfilled(å·²æˆåŠŸ)ã€rejected(å·²å¤±è´¥) çŠ¶æ€æ”¹å˜ï¼šPENDING -> FULFILLEDã€PENDING -> REJECTED ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å¸¦ä½ æ‰‹å†™Promiseä»¥åŠallå’Œraceopen in new window

// promiseä½¿ç”¨
const promise = new Promise((resove, reject) => {
}).then((res) => {})
  .catch((error) => {
    // æ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªpromiseçš„errorå†’æ³¡
  }).finally(() => {
    // æ— è®ºpromiseçŠ¶æ€å¦‚ä½•ï¼Œéƒ½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œ

// promiseå®ç°
const PENDING = "pending"
const RESOLVED = "resolved"
const REJECTED = "rejected"

class MyPromise {
    constructor(executor) {
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–çŠ¶æ€ä¸º pending
        this.status = PENDING
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„å€¼
        this.value = undefined
        // åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„å€¼
        this.reason = undefined

        this.onResolvedCallbacks = []
        this.onRejectedCallbacks = []

        // å®šä¹‰ resolve å‡½æ•°
        const resolve = (value) => {
            if (this.status === PENDING) {
                // æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€ä¸º resolved
                this.status = RESOLVED
                // å­˜å‚¨æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„å€¼
                this.value = value
                // æ‰§è¡Œæ‰€æœ‰æˆåŠŸçŠ¶æ€çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
                this.onResolvedCallbacks.forEach((func) => func())
            }
        }

        // å®šä¹‰ reject å‡½æ•°
        const reject = (reason) => {
            if (this.status === PENDING) {
                // æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€ä¸º rejected
                this.status = REJECTED
                // å­˜å‚¨å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„å€¼
                this.reason = reason
                // æ‰§è¡Œæ‰€æœ‰å¤±è´¥çŠ¶æ€çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
                this.onRejectedCallbacks.forEach((func) => func())
            }
        }

        try {
            // è°ƒç”¨å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå°†resolveå’Œrejectä¼ é€’ç»™å®ƒ
            executor(resolve, reject)
        } catch(e) {
            reject(e)
        }
    }
    then(onResolved, onRejected) {
        // å¦‚æœonResolvedæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é»˜è®¤ä¸ºè¿”å›å€¼ä¸å˜çš„å‡½æ•°
        onResolved = typeof onResolved === "function" ? onResolved : (value) => value
        // å¦‚æœonRejectedæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é»˜è®¤ä¸ºæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸çš„å‡½æ•°
        onRejected =
            typeof onRejected === "function"
                ? onRejected
                : (reason) => {
                      throw reason
                  }
        // è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„Promiseå¯¹è±¡
        return new MyPromise((resolve, reject) => {
            if (this.status == RESOLVED) {
                try {
                    // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºresolvedï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨onResolvedå‡½æ•°å¤„ç†å€¼
                    const x = onResolved(this.value)
                    resolve(x)
                } catch (error) {
                    // å¦‚æœonResolvedå‡½æ•°æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨rejectå‡½æ•°
                    reject(error)
                }
            }
            if (this.status == REJECTED) {
                try {
                    // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºrejectedï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨onRejectedå‡½æ•°å¤„ç†åŸå› 
                    const x = onRejected(this.reason)
                    resolve(x)
                } catch (error) {
                    // å¦‚æœonRejectedå‡½æ•°æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨rejectå‡½æ•°
                    reject(error)
                }
            }
            if (this.status == PENDING) {
                // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºpendingï¼Œåˆ™å°†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æ·»åŠ åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­
                this.onResolvedCallbacks.push(() => {
                    if (this.status == RESOLVED) {
                        try {
                            // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸ºresolvedï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨onResolvedå‡½æ•°å¤„ç†å€¼
                            const x = onResolved(this.value)
                            resolve(x)
                        } catch (error) {
                            // å¦‚æœonResolvedå‡½æ•°æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨rejectå‡½æ•°
                            reject(error)
                        }
                    }
                })
                this.onRejectedCallbacks.push(() => {
                    if (this.status == REJECTED) {
                        try {
                            // å¦‚æœå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸ºrejectedï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨onRejectedå‡½æ•°å¤„ç†åŸå› 
                            const x = onRejected(this.reason)
                            resolve(x)
                        } catch (error) {
                            // å¦‚æœonRejectedå‡½æ•°æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œåˆ™è°ƒç”¨rejectå‡½æ•°
                            reject(error)
                        }
                    }
                })
            } else {
                // æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ‰€æœ‰å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ä¹‹åï¼Œæ¸…ç©ºå›è°ƒæ•°ç»„
                this.onResolvedCallbacks = []
                this.onRejectedCallbacks = []
            }
        })
    }
    catch(onRejected) {
        // ç­‰åŒäºthen(null, onRejected)
        return this.then(null, onRejected)
    }

    /**
     * å°†å¤šä¸ªPromiseå¯¹è±¡åˆå¹¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„Promiseå¯¹è±¡
     * @param {Array} promises - åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªPromiseå¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°ç»„
     * @returns {MyPromise} - åˆå¹¶åçš„Promiseå¯¹è±¡
     */
    static all(promises) {
        return new MyPromise((resolve, reject) => {
            let resolvedCount = 0
            const values = new Array(promises.length)
            for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
                if (!MyPromise.isPromise(promises[i])) {
                    reject(new TypeError("Expected a Promise"))
                    break
                }

                // å¤„ç†æ¯ä¸ªPromise
                promises[i].then(
                    (value) => {
                        resolvedCount++
                        values[i] = value

                        // å½“æ‰€æœ‰Promiseéƒ½æˆåŠŸæ—¶ï¼Œresolveç»“æœæ•°ç»„
                        if (resolvedCount === promises.length) {
                            resolve(values)
                        }
                    },
                    (reason) => {
                        // åªè¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªPromiseå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå°±rejectæ•´ä¸ªPromise.allçš„ç»“æœ
                        reject(reason)
                    }
                )
            }
        })
    }

    /**
     * åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºPromiseå¯¹è±¡
     * @param {*} value - å¾…åˆ¤æ–­çš„å¯¹è±¡
     * @returns {boolean} - æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºPromiseå¯¹è±¡
     */
    static isPromise(value) {
        return (
            value instanceof MyPromise ||
            (typeof value === "object" && value !== null && typeof value.then === "function")
        )
    }
    /**
     * æ‰§è¡Œä¸€ç»„Promiseä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæˆï¼ˆresolveæˆ–rejectï¼‰çš„Promise
     * @param {Array} promises - Promiseå¯¹è±¡æ•°ç»„
     * @returns {MyPromise} - æ–°çš„Promiseå®ä¾‹
     */
    static race(promises) {
        return new MyPromise((resolve, reject) => {
            for (let i = 0; i < promises.length; i++) {
                if (!MyPromise.isPromise(promises[i])) {
                    reject(new TypeError("Expected a Promise"))
                    break
                }

                // å½“ä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ªPromise resolveæˆ–rejectæ—¶ï¼Œç«‹å³ç»“æŸæ–°Promiseçš„çŠ¶æ€
                promises[i].then(
                    (value) => {
                        resolve(value)
                    },
                    (reason) => {
                        reject(reason)
                    }
                )
            }
        })
    }
}

æ‰‹å†™é˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°

å‡½æ•°é˜²æŠ–æ˜¯æŒ‡åœ¨äº‹ä»¶è¢«è§¦å‘ n ç§’åå†æ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨è¿™ n ç§’å†…äº‹ä»¶åˆè¢«è§¦å‘ï¼Œåˆ™é‡æ–°è®¡æ—¶ã€‚è¿™å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åœ¨ä¸€äº›ç‚¹å‡»è¯·æ±‚çš„äº‹ä»¶ä¸Šï¼Œé¿å…å› ä¸ºç”¨æˆ·çš„å¤šæ¬¡ç‚¹å‡»å‘åç«¯å‘é€å¤šæ¬¡è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

function debounce(fn, wait) {
  let timer = null;

  return function() {
    const context = this,
        args = arguments;

    // å¦‚æœæ­¤æ—¶å­˜åœ¨å®šæ—¶å™¨çš„è¯ï¼Œåˆ™å–æ¶ˆä¹‹å‰çš„å®šæ—¶å™¨é‡æ–°è®°æ—¶
    if (timer) {
      clearTimeout(timer);
      timer = null;
    }

    // è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶å™¨ï¼Œä½¿äº‹ä»¶é—´éš”æŒ‡å®šäº‹ä»¶åæ‰§è¡Œ
    timer = setTimeout(() => {
      fn.apply(context, args);
    }, wait);
  };
}

æ‰‹å†™èŠ‚æµå‡½æ•°

å‡½æ•°èŠ‚æµæ˜¯æŒ‡è§„å®šä¸€ä¸ªå•ä½æ—¶é—´ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ä¸ªå•ä½æ—¶é—´å†…ï¼Œåªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€æ¬¡è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªå•ä½æ—¶é—´å†…æŸäº‹ä»¶è¢«è§¦å‘å¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œåªæœ‰ä¸€æ¬¡èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚èŠ‚æµå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åœ¨ scroll å‡½æ•°çš„äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬ä¸Šï¼Œé€šè¿‡äº‹ä»¶èŠ‚æµæ¥é™ä½äº‹ä»¶è°ƒç”¨çš„é¢‘ç‡ã€‚

// å‡½æ•°èŠ‚æµçš„å®ç°;
function throttle(fn, delay) {
  let curTime = Date.now();

  return function() {
    let context = this,
        args = arguments,
        nowTime = Date.now();

    // å¦‚æœä¸¤æ¬¡æ—¶é—´é—´éš”è¶…è¿‡äº†æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´ï¼Œåˆ™æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°ã€‚
    if (nowTime - curTime >= delay) {
      curTime = Date.now();
      return fn.apply(context, args);
    }
  };
}

// å®šæ—¶å™¨å®ç°æ–¹å¼
function throttle (func, delay) {
    let timeout 
    return function() {
        const context = this
        const args = arguments
        if (!timeout) {
            timeout = setTimeout(() => {
                timeout = null
                func.apply(context, arguments)
            }, delay)
        }
    }
}

æ‰‹å†™ç±»å‹åˆ¤æ–­å‡½æ•°

function getType(value) {
    // åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ˜¯nullçš„æƒ…å†µ
    if (value === null) {
        return value + ""
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹çš„æƒ…å†µ
    if (typeof value === "object") {
        let valueClass = Object.prototype.toString.call(value),
            type = valueClass.split(" ")[1].split("")
        type.pop()
        return type.join("").toLowerCase()
    } else {
        // åˆ¤æ–­æ•°æ®æ˜¯åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„æƒ…å†µå’Œå‡½æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µ
        return typeof value
    }
}

æ‰‹å†™callå‡½æ•°

callå‡½æ•°çš„å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå³ä½¿æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å®šä¹‰åœ¨å‡½æ•°çš„åŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°ä½¿ç”¨callç­‰æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚ åˆ¤æ–­ä¼ å…¥ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è®¾ç½®ä¸º window ã€‚ å¤„ç†ä¼ å…¥çš„å‚æ•°ï¼Œæˆªå–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°åçš„æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°ã€‚ å°†å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡æ¥è°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿å­˜è¿”å›ç»“æœã€‚ åˆ é™¤åˆšæ‰æ–°å¢çš„å±æ€§ã€‚ è¿”å›ç»“æœã€‚

// callå‡½æ•°å®ç°
Function.prototype.myCall = function (context) {
    // åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡
    if (typeof this !== "function") {
        console.error("type error")
    }
    // è·å–å‚æ•°
    let args = [...arguments].slice(1),
        result = null
    // åˆ¤æ–­contextæ˜¯å¦ä¼ å…¥ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœªä¼ å…¥åˆ™è®¾ç½®ä¸ºwindow
    context = context || window
    // å°†è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°è®¾ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•
    context.fn = this
    // è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°
    result = context.fn(...args)
    // å°†å±æ€§åˆ é™¤
    delete context.fn
    return result
}

æ‰‹å†™applyå‡½æ•°

applyå‡½æ•°çš„å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå³ä½¿æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å®šä¹‰åœ¨å‡½æ•°çš„åŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°ä½¿ç”¨callç­‰æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚ åˆ¤æ–­ä¼ å…¥ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è®¾ç½®ä¸ºwindow ã€‚ å°†å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§ã€‚ åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°å€¼æ˜¯å¦ä¼ å…¥ ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡æ¥è°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿å­˜è¿”å›ç»“æœã€‚ åˆ é™¤åˆšæ‰æ–°å¢çš„å±æ€§ è¿”å›ç»“æœ

// apply å‡½æ•°å®ç°
Function.prototype.myApply = function(context) {
  // åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå‡½æ•°
  if (typeof this !== "function") {
    throw new TypeError("Error")
  }
  let result = null
  // åˆ¤æ–­ context æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœªä¼ å…¥åˆ™ä¸º window
  context = context || window
  // å°†å‡½æ•°è®¾ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•
  context.fn = this
  // è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•
  if (arguments[1]) {
    result = context.fn(...arguments[1]);
  } else {
    result = context.fn();
  }
  // å°†å±æ€§åˆ é™¤
  delete context.fn;
  return result;
};

æ‰‹å†™bindå‡½æ•°

bindå‡½æ•°çš„å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå³ä½¿æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å®šä¹‰åœ¨å‡½æ•°çš„åŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°ä½¿ç”¨callç­‰æ–¹å¼è°ƒç”¨çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚ ä¿å­˜å½“å‰å‡½æ•°çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œè·å–å…¶ä½™ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°å€¼ã€‚ åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°è¿”å› å‡½æ•°å†…éƒ¨ä½¿ç”¨applyæ¥ç»‘å®šå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºæ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™éœ€è¦ä¼ å…¥å½“å‰å‡½æ•°çš„ this ç»™ apply è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå…¶ä½™æƒ…å†µéƒ½ä¼ å…¥æŒ‡å®šçš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

// bind å‡½æ•°å®ç°
Function.prototype.myBind = function(context) {
  // åˆ¤æ–­è°ƒç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå‡½æ•°
  if (typeof this !== "function") {
    throw new TypeError("Error");
  }
  // è·å–å‚æ•°
  var args = [...arguments].slice(1),
      fn = this;
  return function Fn() {
    // æ ¹æ®è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä¼ å…¥ä¸åŒç»‘å®šå€¼
    return fn.apply(
      this instanceof Fn ? this : context,
      args.concat(...arguments)
    );
  };
};

å‡½æ•°æŸ¯é‡ŒåŒ–å®ç°

å‡½æ•°æŸ¯é‡ŒåŒ–æ¦‚å¿µï¼šæŸ¯é‡ŒåŒ–ï¼ˆCurryingï¼‰æ˜¯æŠŠæ¥å—å¤šä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„å‡½æ•°è½¬å˜ä¸ºæ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ªå•ä¸€å‚æ•°çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›æ¥å—ä½™ä¸‹çš„å‚æ•°ä¸”è¿”å›ç»“æœçš„æ–°å‡½æ•°çš„æŠ€æœ¯ã€‚

function curry(fn) {
    return function curried (...args) {
      // å¦‚æœä¼ å…¥çš„å‚æ•°æ•°é‡è¾¾åˆ°åŸå‡½æ•°çš„å‚æ•°æ•°é‡ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨åŸå‡½æ•°
        if (args.length >= fn.length) {
            return fn.apply(this, args)
        } else {
        // å¦åˆ™è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ¥æ”¶å‚æ•°
            return function (...moreArgs) {
                return curried.apply(this, args.concat(moreArgs))
            }
        }
    }
}

å®ç°add(1)(2)(3)

function add (x, y, z) {
  return x + y + z
}

const curriedAdd = curry(add)
console.log(curriedAdd(1)(2)(3))

å®ç°AJAXè¯·æ±‚

AJAXæ˜¯Asynchronous JavaScript and XMLçš„ç¼©å†™ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯é€šè¿‡JavaScriptçš„å¼‚æ­¥é€šä¿¡ï¼Œä»æœåŠ¡å™¨è·å–XMLæ–‡æ¡£ä»ä¸­æå–æ•°æ®ï¼Œå†æ›´æ–°å½“å‰ç½‘é¡µçš„å¯¹åº”éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè€Œä¸ç”¨åˆ·æ–°æ•´ä¸ªç½‘é¡µã€‚ åˆ›å»ºAJAXè¯·æ±‚çš„æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

  1. åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªXMLHttpRequestå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
  2. åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨openæ–¹æ³•åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªHTTPè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œopenæ–¹æ³•æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯è¯·æ±‚çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€è¯·æ±‚çš„åœ°å€ã€æ˜¯å¦å¼‚æ­¥å’Œç”¨æˆ·çš„è®¤è¯ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
  3. åœ¨å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚å‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ·»åŠ ä¸€äº›ä¿¡æ¯å’Œç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚è¯´å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡setRequestHeaderæ–¹æ³•æ¥ä¸ºè¯·æ±‚æ·»åŠ å¤´ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚è¿˜å¯ä»¥ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°ã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªXMLHttpRequestå¯¹è±¡ä¸€å…±æœ‰5ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå½“å®ƒçš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–æ—¶ä¼šè§¦å‘onreadystatechange äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è®¾ç½®ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¥å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸåçš„ç»“æœã€‚å½“å¯¹è±¡çš„readyStateå˜ä¸º4çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä»£è¡¨æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ¥æ”¶å®Œæˆï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡åˆ¤æ–­è¯·æ±‚çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¦‚æœçŠ¶æ€æ˜¯2xxæˆ–è€…304çš„è¯åˆ™ä»£è¡¨è¿”å›æ­£å¸¸ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™å°±å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡responseä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ¥å¯¹é¡µé¢è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°äº†ã€‚ å½“å¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§å’Œç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°è®¾ç½®å®Œæˆåï¼Œæœ€åè°ƒç”¨sentæ–¹æ³•æ¥å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°ä½œä¸ºå‘é€çš„æ•°æ®ä½“ã€‚
const SERVER_URL = "/server";

// åˆ›å»º Http è¯·æ±‚

// è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
  if (this.readyState !== 4) return;
  // å½“è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸæ—¶
  if (this.status === 200) {
    handle(this.response);
  } else {
    console.error(this.statusText);
  }
};
// è®¾ç½®è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥æ—¶çš„ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°

  console.error(this.statusText);
};
// è®¾ç½®è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¿¡æ¯

xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
// å‘é€ Http è¯·æ±‚
xhr.send(null);

// xhr.readyState
// 0-å°šæœªè°ƒç”¨open
// 1-å·²è°ƒç”¨open
// 2-å·²è°ƒç”¨send

ä½¿ç”¨Promiseå°è£…AJAXè¯·æ±‚

// promise å°è£…å®ç°ï¼š
function getJSON(url) {
  // åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª promise å¯¹è±¡
  let promise = new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
    let xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    // æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ª http è¯·æ±‚
    xhr.open("GET", url, true);
    // è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€çš„ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
    xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
      if (this.readyState !== 4) return;
      // å½“è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸæˆ–å¤±è´¥æ—¶ï¼Œæ”¹å˜ promise çš„çŠ¶æ€
      if (this.status === 200) {
        resolve(this.response);
      } else {
        reject(new Error(this.statusText));
      }
    };
    // è®¾ç½®é”™è¯¯ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
    xhr.onerror = function() {
      reject(new Error(this.statusText));
    };
    // è®¾ç½®å“åº”çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
    xhr.responseType = "json";
    // è®¾ç½®è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¿¡æ¯
    xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json");
    // å‘é€ http è¯·æ±‚
    xhr.send(null);
  });
  return promise;
}

å®ç°æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼åŒ–å‡½æ•°

// è¾“å…¥ï¼š

dateFormat(new Date('2020-04-01'), 'yyyyå¹´MMæœˆddæ—¥') // 2020å¹´04æœˆ01æ—¥
const dateFormat = (dateInput, format)=>{
    const day = dateInput.getDate() 
    const month = dateInput.getMonth() + 1  
    const year = dateInput.getFullYear()   
    format = format.replace(/yyyy/, year)
    format = format.replace(/MM/,month)
    format = format.replace(/dd/,day)
    return format
}

for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    const randomIndex = Math.round(Math.random() * (arr.length - 1 - i)) + i
    ;[arr[i], arr[randomIndex]] = [arr[randomIndex], arr[i]]
}

let length = arr.length,
    randomIndex,
    temp
while (length) {
    randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * length--)
    temp = arr[length]
    arr[length] = arr[randomIndex]
    arr[randomIndex] = temp
}

å®ç°æ•°ç»„çš„æ‰å¹³åŒ–

1.é€’å½’å®ç°

const arr = [1, [2, [3, 4, 5]]]
function flatten(arr) {
    let result = []
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        if (Array.isArray(arr[i])) {
            result = result.concat(flatten(arr[i]))
        } else {
            result.push(arr[i])
        }
    }
    return result
}
flatten(arr) //  [1, 2, 3, 4ï¼Œ5]

2.reduceå‡½æ•°

const arr = [1, [2, [3, 4]]]
function flatten(arr) {
    return arr.reduce(function(prev, next){
        return prev.concat(Array.isArray(next) ? flatten(next) : next)
    }, [])
}
console.log(flatten(arr)) //  [1, 2, 3, 4ï¼Œ5]

3.æ‰©å±•è¿ç®—ç¬¦&&some

const arr = [1, [2, [3, 4]]]
function flatten(arr) {
    while (arr.some(item => Array.isArray(item))) {
        arr = [].concat(...arr)
    }
    return arr
}
console.log(flatten(arr)) //  [1, 2, 3, 4ï¼Œ5]

4.split&&toString

  return arr.toString().split(',')
}
console.log(flatten(arr)) //  [1, 2, 3, 4ï¼Œ5]

6.æ­£åˆ™å’ŒJSONæ–¹æ³•

const arr = [1, [2, [3, [4, 5]]], 6]
function flatten(arr) {
  let str = JSON.stringify(arr)
  str = str.replace(/(\[|\])/g, '')
  str = '[' + str + ']'
  return JSON.parse(str)
}
console.log(flatten(arr)) //  [1, 2, 3, 4ï¼Œ5]

// ES5æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä½¿ç”¨mapå­˜å‚¨ä¸é‡å¤çš„æ•°å­—
const array = [1, 2, 3, 5, 1, 5, 9, 1, 2, 8];
uniqueArray(array); // [1, 2, 3, 5, 9, 8]

function uniqueArray(array) {
  let map = {}
  let res = []
  for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
    if(!map.hasOwnProperty([array[i]])) {
      map[array[i]] = 1
      res.push(array[i])
    }
  }
  return res
}

å®ç°æ•°ç»„çš„pushæ–¹æ³•

let arr = []
Array.prototype._push = function() {
  for( let i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++){
    this[this.length] = arguments[i]
  }
  return this.length
}

å®ç°æ•°ç»„çš„filteræ–¹æ³•??

Array.prototype._filter = function(fn) {
    if (typeof fn !== "function") {
        throw Error('å‚æ•°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°');
    }
    const res = [];
    for (let i = 0, len = this.length; i < len; i++) {
        fn(this[i]) && res.push(this[i]);
    }
    return res;
}

å®ç°æ•°ç»„çš„mapæ–¹æ³•??

Array.prototype._map = function(fn) {
   if (typeof fn !== "function") {
        throw Error('å‚æ•°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°');
    }
    const res = [];
    for (let i = 0, len = this.length; i < len; i++) {
        res.push(fn(this[i]));
    }
    return res;
}

// è¾“å…¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²sï¼Œä»¥åŠå…¶é‡å¤çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºé‡å¤çš„ç»“æœï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚è¾“å…¥abcï¼Œ2ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºabcabcã€‚
function repeat(s, n) {
  console.log('====', new Array(n + 1))
    return (new Array(n + 1)).join(s);
}

repeat('abc', 2)
// é€’å½’ï¼š
function repeat(s, n) {
    return (n > 0) ? s.concat(repeat(s, --n)) : "";
}

// éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå¿…é¡»é€šè¿‡å®ä¾‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹åå†å»è°ƒç”¨å®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸ç„¶æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

æ­£åˆ™å†™13-15ä½å¤§å†™å­—æ¯æˆ–æ•°å­—

å°†æ•°å­—æ¯åƒåˆ†ä½ç”¨é€—å·éš”å¼€??

// æ•°å­—æœ‰å°æ•°ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š
let format = n => {
    let num = n.toString() // è½¬æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    let decimals = ''
        // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å°æ•°
    num.indexOf('.') > -1 ? decimals = num.split('.')[1] : decimals
    let len = num.length
    if (len <= 3) {
        return num
    } else {
        let temp = ''
        let remainder = len % 3
        decimals ? temp = '.' + decimals : temp
        if (remainder > 0) { // ä¸æ˜¯3çš„æ•´æ•°å€
            return num.slice(0, remainder) + ',' + num.slice(remainder, len).match(/\d{3}/g).join(',') + temp
        } else { // æ˜¯3çš„æ•´æ•°å€
            return num.slice(0, len).match(/\d{3}/g).join(',') + temp 
        }
    }
}
format(12323.33)  // '12,323.33'

// æ•°å­—æ— å°æ•°ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

let format = n => {
    let num = n.toString() 
    let len = num.length
    if (len <= 3) {
        return num
    } else {
        let remainder = len % 3
        if (remainder > 0) { // ä¸æ˜¯3çš„æ•´æ•°å€
            return num.slice(0, remainder) + ',' + num.slice(remainder, len).match(/\d{3}/g).join(',') 
        } else { // æ˜¯3çš„æ•´æ•°å€
            return num.slice(0, len).match(/\d{3}/g).join(',') 
        }
    }
}
format(1232323)  // '1,232,323'

å®ç°éè´Ÿå¤§æ•´æ•°ç›¸åŠ ??

JavaScriptå¯¹æ•°å€¼æœ‰èŒƒå›´çš„é™åˆ¶ï¼Œé™åˆ¶å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

Number.MAX_VALUE // 1.7976931348623157e+308
Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER // 9007199254740991
Number.MIN_VALUE // 5e-324
Number.MIN_SAFE_INTEGER // -9007199254740991

å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªè¶…å¤§çš„æ•´æ•°(> Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER)è¿›è¡ŒåŠ æ³•è¿ç®—ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åˆæƒ³è¾“å‡ºä¸€èˆ¬å½¢å¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä½¿ç”¨+æ˜¯æ— æ³•è¾¾åˆ°çš„ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦æ•°å­—è¶…è¿‡ Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGERæ•°å­—ä¼šè¢«ç«‹å³è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç§‘å­¦è®¡æ•°æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ•°å­—ç²¾åº¦ç›¸æ¯”ä»¥å‰å°†ä¼šæœ‰è¯¯å·®ã€‚

å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªç®—æ³•è¿›è¡Œå¤§æ•°çš„ç›¸åŠ ï¼š

function sumBigNumber(a, b) {
    let res = ""
    let temp = 0

    a = a.split("")
    b = b.split("")

    while (a.length || b.length || temp) {
        temp += ~~a.pop() + ~~b.pop()
        res = (temp % 10) + res
        temp = temp > 9
    }
    return res.replace(/^0+/, "")
}

å…¶ä¸»è¦çš„æ€è·¯å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š é¦–å…ˆç”¨å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥ä¿å­˜å¤§æ•°ï¼Œè¿™æ ·æ•°å­—åœ¨æ•°å­¦è¡¨ç¤ºä¸Šå°±ä¸ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ– åˆå§‹åŒ–resï¼Œtempæ¥ä¿å­˜ä¸­é—´çš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœï¼Œå¹¶å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿è¿›è¡Œæ¯ä¸€ä½çš„åŠ æ³•è¿ç®— å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„å¯¹åº”çš„ä½è¿›è¡Œç›¸åŠ ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç›¸åŠ çš„ç»“æœå¯èƒ½å¤§äº10ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯èƒ½è¦ä»…ä¸ºï¼Œå¯¹10è¿›è¡Œå–ä½™æ“ä½œï¼Œå°†ç»“æœä¿å­˜åœ¨å½“å‰ä½ åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰ä½æ˜¯å¦å¤§äº9ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ˜¯å¦ä¼šè¿›ä½ï¼Œè‹¥æ˜¯åˆ™å°†tempèµ‹å€¼ä¸ºtrueï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨åŠ æ³•è¿ç®—ä¸­ï¼Œtrueä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨éšå¼è½¬åŒ–ä¸º1ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿äºä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡ç›¸åŠ  é‡å¤ä¸Šè¿°æ“ä½œï¼Œç›´è‡³è®¡ç®—ç»“æŸ

ä»£ç å®ç°

function jsonToTree(data) {
    // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»“æœæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¹¶åˆ¤æ–­è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®çš„æ ¼å¼
    let result = []
    if (!Array.isArray(data)) {
        return result
    }
    // ä½¿ç”¨mapï¼Œå°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡çš„idä¸å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡å¯¹åº”å­˜å‚¨èµ·æ¥
    let map = {}
    data.forEach((item) => {
        map[item.id] = {
          ...item,
          children: []
        }
    })
    data.forEach((item) => {
        if (item.pid) {
            if (map[item.pid]) {
                map[item.pid].children.push(map[item.id]);
            }
        } else {
            result.push(map[item.id])
        }
    })
    return result
}

è§£æURL Paramsä¸ºå¯¹è±¡

const url = 'http://www.domain.com/?user=anonymous&id=123&id=456&city=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC&enabled'
parseParam(url)
/* ç»“æœ
{ user: 'anonymous',
  id: [123, 456], // é‡å¤å‡ºç°çš„ key è¦ç»„è£…æˆæ•°ç»„ï¼Œèƒ½è¢«è½¬æˆæ•°å­—çš„å°±è½¬æˆæ•°å­—ç±»å‹
  city: 'åŒ—äº¬', // ä¸­æ–‡éœ€è§£ç 
  enabled: true, // æœªæŒ‡å®šå€¼å¾—keyçº¦å®šä¸ºtrue
}
*/
function parseParam(url) {
    const paramsStr = /.+\?(.+)$/.exec(url)[1] // å°†?åé¢çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å–å‡ºæ¥
    const paramsArr = paramsStr.split("&") // å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä»¥&åˆ†å‰²åå­˜åˆ°æ•°ç»„ä¸­
    let paramsObj = {}
    // å°† params å­˜åˆ°å¯¹è±¡ä¸­
    paramsArr.forEach((param) => {
        if (/=/.test(param)) {
            // å¤„ç†æœ‰ value çš„å‚æ•°
            let [key, val] = param.split("=") // åˆ†å‰² key å’Œ value
            val = decodeURIComponent(val) // è§£ç 
            val = /^\d+$/.test(val) ? parseFloat(val) : val // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è½¬ä¸ºæ•°å­—
            if (paramsObj.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
                // å¦‚æœå¯¹è±¡æœ‰keyï¼Œåˆ™æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼
                paramsObj[key] = [].concat(paramsObj[key], val)
            } else {
                // å¦‚æœå¯¹è±¡æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªkeyï¼Œåˆ›å»º key å¹¶è®¾ç½®å€¼
                paramsObj[key] = val
            }
        } else {
            // å¤„ç†æ²¡æœ‰ value çš„å‚æ•°
            paramsObj[param] = true
        }
    })
    return paramsObj
}

const task = (timer, light, callback) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        if (light === 'red') {
            red()
        }
        else if (light === 'green') {
            green()
        }
        else if (light === 'yellow') {
            yellow()
        }
        callback()
    }, timer)
}
const step = () => {
    task(3000, 'red', () => {
        task(2000, 'green', () => {
            task(1000, 'yellow', step)
        })
    })
}
step()

    new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            if (light === 'red') {
                red()
            }
            else if (light === 'green') {
                green()
            }
            else if (light === 'yellow') {
                yellow()
            }
            resolve()
        }, timer)
    })
const step = () => {
    task(3000, 'red')
        .then(() => task(2000, 'green'))
        .then(() => task(2100, 'yellow'))
        .then(step)
}

// è¿™é‡Œå°†å›è°ƒç§»é™¤ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€æ¬¡äº®ç¯ç»“æŸåï¼Œresolveå½“å‰promiseï¼Œå¹¶ä¾ç„¶ä½¿ç”¨é€’å½’è¿›è¡Œã€‚

å®ç°å‘å¸ƒ-è®¢é˜…æ¨¡å¼

class EventCenter{
    // 1. å®šä¹‰äº‹ä»¶å®¹å™¨ï¼Œç”¨æ¥è£…äº‹ä»¶æ•°ç»„
    let handlers = {}
  
    // 2. æ·»åŠ äº‹ä»¶æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå‚æ•°ï¼šäº‹ä»¶å äº‹ä»¶æ–¹æ³•
    on(type, handler) {
      // åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ•°ç»„å®¹å™¨
      if (!this.handlers[type]) {
        this.handlers[type] = []
      }
      // å­˜å…¥äº‹ä»¶
      this.handlers[type].push(handler)
    }
  
    // 3. è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå‚æ•°ï¼šäº‹ä»¶å äº‹ä»¶å‚æ•°
    emit(type, params) {
      // è‹¥æ²¡æœ‰æ³¨å†Œè¯¥äº‹ä»¶åˆ™æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯
      if (!this.handlers[type]) {
        return new Error('è¯¥äº‹ä»¶æœªæ³¨å†Œ')
      }
      // è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶
      this.handlers[type].forEach(handler => {
        handler(...params)
      })
    }
  
    // 4. äº‹ä»¶ç§»é™¤ï¼Œå‚æ•°ï¼šäº‹ä»¶å è¦åˆ é™¤äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œè‹¥æ— ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°åˆ™åˆ é™¤è¯¥äº‹ä»¶çš„è®¢é˜…å’Œå‘å¸ƒ
    off(type, handler) {
      if (!this.handlers[type]) {
        return new Error('äº‹ä»¶æ— æ•ˆ')
      }
      if (!handler) {
        // ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶
        delete this.handlers[type]
      } else {
        const index = this.handlers[type].findIndex(el => el === handler)
        if (index === -1) {
          return new Error('æ— è¯¥ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶')
        }
        // ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶
        this.handlers[type].splice(index, 1)
        if (this.handlers[type].length === 0) {
          delete this.handlers[type]
        }
      }
    }
  }

æŸ¥æ‰¾æ–‡ç« ä¸­å‡ºç°é¢‘ç‡æœ€é«˜çš„å•è¯??

function findMostWord(article) {
    // åˆæ³•æ€§åˆ¤æ–­
    if (!article) return
    // å‚æ•°å¤„ç†
    article = article.trim().toLowerCase()
    let wordList = article.match(/[a-z]+/g),
        visited = [],
        maxNum = 0,
        maxWord = ""
    article = " " + wordList.join("  ") + " "
    // éå†åˆ¤æ–­å•è¯å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°
    wordList.forEach(function (item) {
        if (visited.indexOf(item) < 0) {
            // åŠ å…¥ visited
            visited.push(item)
            let word = new RegExp(" " + item + " ", "g"),
                num = article.match(word).length
            if (num > maxNum) {
                maxNum = num
                maxWord = item
            }
        }
    })
    return maxWord + "  " + maxNum
}

å°è£…å¼‚æ­¥çš„fetchï¼Œä½¿ç”¨async awaitæ–¹å¼æ¥ä½¿ç”¨??

(async () => {
    class HttpRequestUtil {
        async get(url) {
            const res = await fetch(url);
            const data = await res.json();
            return data;
        }
        async post(url, data) {
            const res = await fetch(url, {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                body: JSON.stringify(data)
            });
            const result = await res.json();
            return result;
        }
        async put(url, data) {
            const res = await fetch(url, {
                method: 'PUT',
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                data: JSON.stringify(data)
            });
            const result = await res.json();
            return result;
        }
        async delete(url, data) {
            const res = await fetch(url, {
                method: 'DELETE',
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                },
                data: JSON.stringify(data)
            });
            const result = await res.json();
            return result;
        }
    }
    const httpRequestUtil = new HttpRequestUtil();
    const res = await httpRequestUtil.get('http://golderbrother.cn/');
    console.log(res);
})()

    this.flag2 = flag2;

//å­ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶
SubFunction.prototype = superInstance;

//å­è°ƒç”¨è‡ªå·±å’Œçˆ¶çš„å±æ€§

// hashè·¯ç”±
class Route {
    constructor() {
        // è·¯ç”±å­˜å‚¨å¯¹è±¡
        this.routes = {}
        // å½“å‰hash
        this.currentHash = ""
        // ç»‘å®šthisï¼Œé¿å…ç›‘å¬æ—¶thisæŒ‡å‘æ”¹å˜
        this.freshRoute = this.freshRoute.bind(this)
        // ç›‘å¬
        window.addEventListener("load", this.freshRoute, false)
        window.addEventListener("hashchange", this.freshRoute, false)
    }
    // å­˜å‚¨
    storeRoute(path, cb) {
        this.routes[path] = cb || function () {}
    }
    // æ›´æ–°
    freshRoute() {
        this.currentHash = location.hash.slice(1) || "/"
        this.routes[this.currentHash]()
    }
}

å®ç°æ–æ³¢é‚£å¥‘æ•°åˆ—

// leetcode 509
function fib(n) {
  let dp = new Array(n + 1).fill(0)
  dp[0] = 0, dp[1] = 1
  for (let i = 2; i <= n, i++) {
    dp[i] = dp[i -1] + dp[i -2]
  }
  return dp[n]
}

å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡ºç°çš„ä¸é‡å¤æœ€é•¿é•¿åº¦??

ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£è£…æ²¡æœ‰é‡å¤çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œæšä¸¾å­—ç¬¦è®°å½•æœ€å¤§å€¼å³å¯ã€‚ç”¨ map ç»´æŠ¤å­—ç¬¦çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œé‡åˆ°ç›¸åŒçš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼ŒæŠŠå·¦è¾¹ç•Œç§»åŠ¨è¿‡å»å³å¯ã€‚æŒªåŠ¨çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­è®°å½•æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ï¼š

var lengthOfLongestSubstring = function (s) {
    let map = new Map();
    let i = -1
    let res = 0
    let n = s.length
    for (let j = 0; j < n; j++) {
        if (map.has(s[j])) {
            i = Math.max(i, map.get(s[j]))
        }
        res = Math.max(res, j - i)
        map.set(s[j], j)
    }
    return res
};

å°å­©æŠ¥æ•°é—®é¢˜??

æœ‰30ä¸ªå°å­©å„¿ï¼Œç¼–å·ä»1-30ï¼Œå›´æˆä¸€åœˆä¾æ­¤æŠ¥æ•°ï¼Œ1ã€2ã€3 æ•°åˆ°3çš„å°å­©å„¿é€€å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªåœˆï¼Œ ç„¶åä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå°å­©æ–°æŠ¥æ•° 1ã€2ã€3ï¼Œé—®æœ€åå‰©ä¸‹çš„é‚£ä¸ªå°å­©å„¿çš„ç¼–å·æ˜¯å¤šå°‘?

// leetcode 412
function childNum(num, count){
    let allplayer = [];    
    for(let i = 0; i < num; i++){
        allplayer[i] = i + 1;
    }
    
    let exitCount = 0;    // ç¦»å¼€äººæ•°
    let counter = 0;      // è®°å½•æŠ¥æ•°
    let curIndex = 0;     // å½“å‰ä¸‹æ ‡
    
    while(exitCount < num - 1){
        if(allplayer[curIndex] !== 0) counter++;    
        
        if(counter == count){
            allplayer[curIndex] = 0;                 
            counter = 0;
            exitCount++;  
        }
        curIndex++;
        if(curIndex == num){
            curIndex = 0               
        };           
    }    
    for(i = 0; i < num; i++){
        if(allplayer[i] !== 0){
            return allplayer[i]
        }      
    }
}
childNum(30, 3)

ä½¿ç”¨setTimeoutå®ç°setInterval??

setIntervalçš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯æ¯éš”ä¸€æ®µæŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´æ‰§è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œä¸æ˜¯çœŸçš„åˆ°äº†æ—¶é—´ç«‹å³æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå®ƒçœŸæ­£çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯æ¯éš”ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´å°†äº‹ä»¶åŠ å…¥äº‹ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å»ï¼Œåªæœ‰å½“å‰çš„æ‰§è¡Œæ ˆä¸ºç©ºçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½å»ä»äº‹ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å–å‡ºäº‹ä»¶æ‰§è¡Œã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°è¿™æ ·çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å½“å‰æ‰§è¡Œæ ˆæ‰§è¡Œçš„æ—¶é—´å¾ˆé•¿ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´äº‹ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—é‡Œè¾¹ç§¯ç´¯å¤šä¸ªå®šæ—¶å™¨åŠ å…¥çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå½“æ‰§è¡Œæ ˆç»“æŸçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œè¿™äº›äº‹ä»¶ä¼šä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå› æ­¤å°±ä¸èƒ½åˆ°é—´éš”ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ•ˆæœã€‚

é’ˆå¯¹ setIntervalçš„è¿™ä¸ªç¼ºç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ setTimeout é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨æ¥æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ setIntervalï¼Œè¿™æ ·æˆ‘ä»¬å°±ç¡®ä¿äº†åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶ç»“æŸäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ‰ä¼šè§¦å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå®šæ—¶å™¨äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™æ ·è§£å†³äº† setInterval çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

å®ç°æ€è·¯æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨é€’å½’å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸æ–­åœ°å»æ‰§è¡ŒsetTimeoutä»è€Œè¾¾åˆ°setIntervalçš„æ•ˆæœ

function mySetInterval(fn, timeout) {
  // æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å®šæ—¶å™¨æ˜¯å¦ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ
  var timer = {
    flag: true
  }
  // è®¾ç½®é€’å½’å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿå®šæ—¶å™¨æ‰§è¡Œã€‚
  function interval() {
    if (timer.flag) {
      fn()
      setTimeout(interval, timeout)
    }
  }
  // å¯åŠ¨å®šæ—¶å™¨
  setTimeout(interval, timeout)
  // è¿”å›æ§åˆ¶å™¨
  return timer
}

// åŠ¨æ€çš„åŠ è½½jsæ–‡ä»¶
function addScript(src) {
  const script = document.createElement('script')
  script.src = src
  script.type = "text/javascript"
  document.body.appendChild(script)
}
addScript("http://xxx.xxx.com/xxx.js?callback=handleRes")
// è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€çš„callbackå‡½æ•°æ¥æ¥æ”¶å›è°ƒç»“æœ
function handleRes(res) {
  console.log(res)
}
// æ¥å£è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼
handleRes({a: 1, b: 2})

æŸ¥æ‰¾æœ‰åºäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„çš„ç›®æ ‡å€¼

// leetcode 74
var findNumberIn2DArray = function(matrix, target) {
    let m = matrix.length, n = matrix[0].length
    let left = 0, right = m * n -1
    while(left <= right) {
        const mid = Math.floor((left + right) / 2)
        const midVal = matrix[Math.floor(mid / 2)][mid % n]
        if (target === midVal) {
            return true
        } else if (target > midVal ){
            left++
        } else {
            right--
        }
    }
    return false
};

äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„æ–œå‘æ‰“å°ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ

// leetcode 498
function printMatrix(arr){
  let m = arr.length, n = arr[0].length
	let res = []
  
  // å·¦ä¸Šè§’ï¼Œä»0 åˆ° n - 1 åˆ—è¿›è¡Œæ‰“å°
  for (let k = 0; k < n; k++) {
    for (let i = 0, j = k; i < m && j >= 0; i++, j--) {
      res.push(arr[i][j]);
    }
  }

  // å³ä¸‹è§’ï¼Œä»1 åˆ° n - 1 è¡Œè¿›è¡Œæ‰“å°
  for (let k = 1; k < m; k++) {
    for (let i = k, j = n - 1; i < m && j >= 0; i++, j--) {
      res.push(arr[i][j]);
    }
  }
  return res
}

æŒ‰è¦æ±‚å®ç°ä»¥ä¸‹åŠŸèƒ½

å®ç°å‰ç«¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¹¶å‘è¯·æ±‚æ§åˆ¶å‡½æ•° 1.è¾“å…¥URLæ•°ç»„å’Œé™åˆ¶è¯·æ±‚æ•° 2.æŒ‰ç…§é™åˆ¶è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ§åˆ¶å‰ç«¯åŒæ—¶å¯ä»¥å¹¶å‘è¯·æ±‚æ•°é‡ 3.è¯·æ±‚æ“ä½œç›´æ¥ç”¨window.fetch

// Example usage
const urls = [
    'https://api.example.com/data1',
    'https://api.example.com/data2',
    'https://api.example.com/data3',
    // Add more URLs as needed
];

const limit = 2;

async function concurrentRequests(urls, limit) {
    const results = [];
    const inFlightRequests = [];
    
    async function makeRequest(url) {
        try {
            const response = await fetch(url);
            const data = await response.json();
            results.push(data);
        } catch (error) {
            results.push({ error: error.message });
        }
    }
    
    for (let i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) {
        const request = makeRequest(urls[i]);
        inFlightRequests.push(request);
        
        if (inFlightRequests.length === limit || i === urls.length - 1) {
            await Promise.all(inFlightRequests);
            inFlightRequests.length = 0;
        }
    }
    
    return results;
}

concurrentRequests(urls, limit)
    .then(results => console.log(results))
    .catch(error => console.error(error));
